content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentoring is a training program where more experienced colleagues – mentors share knowledge with less experienced specialists – mentees. The program includes a theoretical part, practical tasks and trainings, and allows mentees to address their questions to the mentors and receive feedback from them. The Mentoring program benefits both sides. Mentees can acquire new skills and knowledge required for working on a project and career growth. Mentors can develop soft skills and get mentoring experience, which is very important for the leadership roles.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are two types of mentoring
